title: Major Account Bug ( And No this shouldn't be in player behavior it is a BUG)

embed.description: The easy way to save screenshots, GIFs, and websites. Make everyone happy by sharing smarter, faster, and with your point crystal clear.

body:
Here's a link to the screen shots I took because my account has a major error on it, It's saying I have a 10 game chat restriction, but when I click I Agree it will not let me play any games I've relogged multiple times. Here's the links to my screenshots on this matter. ---
https://gyazo.com/626dde331df4159ad5ce9d56fa500d78

https://gyazo.com/fa6eea1dc02b8f78980a38891fa0ffc4

I've sent support tickets about 24 hours ago. Nobody responded.

replies.body:
1. Repair the game by clicking the question mark icon to the top right of the patcher. Select "Repair" and let the patcher scan and repair corrupt game files. When the process is completed, you'll see the orange "Launch" button.

2. Don't send multiple ticket on the same issue, this won't get you a reply sooner. 

3. Let us know if #1 worked.

I tried that method. Nothing changed, still can't play any games whatsoever, i can log into the account and it doesn't say I'm banned at all. I can click agree on the chat ban but my chat won't reconnect and I can't make any games.
Close the most recent tickets you've opened, leave the one you opened the earliest open and await a response.
How do you close the tickets ?
Reply to the ticket and select "Consider this request solved" box when you reply.
Done I only did that for one of the requests, I sent in two. I did it for the first one I made the other one has about 17 hours of waiting time on it.
A Support Specialist should get to you by Tomorrow. Let us know if this isn't the case though.
Really hoping so, Been waiting for two days just to play league.
Still Nothing done for me, I thought Riot Employees checked the boards :/
24 hours haven't passed yet. Patience Summoner.
The ticket I sent is over 24 hours now Im pretty sure, Or cutting it very close.
When I stated 24 hours, I meant an additional 24 hours. Apologies for the confusion.
Has been 2 days total now and counting. No replies yet.
I thought you were fired....
Why would you think that?
Still Nothing, I even sent the message to the other ticket and it still doesn't say its solved. Kinda just feel ignored right now.
A Specialist should get to you within the next 24 hours.
Sounds good, still nothing for me on this end. Not much league being played for me, hopefully it gets fixed.
high... lol thought you were DTN
DTN's very much present and I'm working alongside them, Riot and the Wrenchmen.

> [{quoted}](name=Rineyy,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=mHaBVaAH,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-07-20T00:45:17.284+0000)
>
> 1. Repair the game by clicking the question mark icon to the top right of the patcher. Select "Repair" and let the patcher scan and repair corrupt game files. When the process is completed, you'll see the orange "Launch" button.
> 
> 2. Don't send multiple ticket on the same issue, this won't get you a reply sooner. 
> 
> 3. Let us know if #1 worked.

Trying it out right now, I've never had this kind of problem before so I'm thinking it's just the account that is bugged not the client.

I know it can be frustrating, but I recommend to continue to be patient while a specialist gets back to you. We deal with a lot of tickets every day, so it's important not to "bump" your ticket by replying to it after you've already made the initial request, as it will put your ticket to the back of the queue.

Let me know if you have any questions and please follow up with me if you don't see a reply by the weekend.

> [{quoted}](name=Targons Blade,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=mHaBVaAH,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-07-20T16:23:02.388+0000)
>
> I know it can be frustrating, but I recommend to continue to be patient while a specialist gets back to you. We deal with a lot of tickets every day, so it's important not to "bump" your ticket by replying to it after you've already made the initial request, as it will put your ticket to the back of the queue.
> 
> Let me know if you have any questions and please follow up with me if you don't see a reply by the weekend.

I closed out one of my tickets, Saying "Consider this matter closed" That still says open, I haven't sent any more since the first two I sent and the one I didn't consider closed has a 2 day wait time on it already still Open.
